authentication_protection/description: Sign in to save your progress and access your decks from any device.
deck_details_loading/loading: We are loading the deck details for you...
deck_update_actions/toast/deck_updated/d: Your deck has been updated successfully
deck_update_actions/toast/lesson_deleted: You will have to save the deck to apply the changes.
deck_update_actions/toast/lesson_renamed: You will have to save the deck to apply the changes.
deck_update_add_cards_to_lesson_modal/de: This cards will be added in the selected lesson. This cards will not be removed from the current lesson.
deck_update_ai_modal/description: Use AI to help you update your deck with new cards or improvements.
deck_update_ai_modal/textarea_placeholde: Tell the AI what you want to do with your deck...
deck_update_import_csv_modal/description: We successfully loaded your file, but we did not find the front and back columns. Please select the corresponding columns to help us map them.
deck_update_reorder_lessons_modal/descri: Reorder lessons by moving them up or down using the arrows.
deck_update_tabs_rename_modal/descriptio: Please use small and concise names for your lessons. Remember other users will use your deck.
decks_actions/dialog/create_deck/errors/: Each card must have front and back text.
Front and back languages must be different.
Title must be 50 characters or fewer.
decks_actions/toast/deck_duplicated_succ: Now, you can edit it as you want, it's your own deck now.
decks_list_placeholder/description: You can create or search for lessons made by the community.
decks_loading/loading: We are loading the decks for you...
decks_update_description/description/pla: Describe your deck in a few words
decks_update_description/length_error: This field must be 50 characters or less, here it's {length} long.
decks_update_title/length_error: This field must be 50 characters or less, here it's {length} long.
decks_update_title/title/placeholder: Enter a title for your deck
discover_decks_filters/message: I speak  <spoken_language></spoken_language> and I want to learn <learning_language></learning_language>
discover_decks_search_modal/modal_descri: Enter a deck title to filter the results.
params_account_section/section/descripti: Manage your account settings and authentication.
params_danger_zone/delete_account_button: Delete your account and all your data ?
params_danger_zone/section/description: These actions are irreversible. Use with caution.
params_select_language/section/descripti: We automatically detect your language based on your browser settings. But, you can change it here.
params_select_theme/section/description: Because we have different tastes, we have different themes. Click on a theme to apply it and see how it looks.
params_session_behavior/how_many_words_t: How many new cards to learn ?
How many cards in randomize mode ?
params_session_behavior/section/descript: Here, you can select the number of cards displayed in each session.
session_ended_splash_screen/session_end_: You reviewed <totalKbd>{total}</totalKbd> cards. <knownKbd>{known}</knownKbd> cards are mastered, but <unknownKbd>{unknown}</unknownKbd> will need more review.
session_footer_help/message: Press {space} or click the card to flip the card. Press {right} if you know the word. Press {left} if you don't know the word.
session_no_more_review/learned_all_cards: You've learned all the cards in this deck. You should review cards to reinforce your memory!
There is no more cards to learn
session_no_more_review/reviewed_all_card: You've reviewed all the cards in this deck today. Maybe it's time to learn new cards?
There is no more cards to review today
session_no_more_review/reviewed_and_lear: You've learned all the cards in this deck and there are no cards to review today. If you'd like to practice, you can start a random session. Don't worry - random sessions won't affect your review progress, so you can practice freely without consequences.
There is no more cards to review and learn
session_reviewed_words_table/cards_to_re: Great job! You got all the cards right this time.
More cards you'll probably get wrong next time…
session_reviewed_words_table/mastered_ca: Well, well… looks like you haven't mastered any cards yet, but hey, at least you're trying!
session_reviewed_words_table/next_due_to: This card will be reviewable again on {date}
session_reviewed_words_table/streak_tool: You've reviewed this card {count} times without mistakes
